# GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionLocalizations | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionLocalizations ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionLocalizations)

-  GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionLocalizations 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionLocalizations

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionLocalizations#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionLocalizations
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionLocalizations#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionLocalizations#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionLocalizations#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppStoreVersionAppStoreVersionLocalizationsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstoreversionappstoreversionlocalizationslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionLocalizations#see-also)

### [Reading Localization Information](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionLocalizations#Reading-Localization-Information)

[`List All App Store Version Localizations for an App Store Version`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversions-_id_-appstoreversionlocalizations)Get a list of localized, version-level information about an app, for all locales.
